resources.string: Welcome! This is an app built to collect sensor information during side taps. Please choose the type of logging to be done: either 5 points distributed around the device, or 2 points, on the left and right of the device.
Please select the hand you are using to hold the device. Important note: once the data collection starts, please ensure that you do not switch from the selected hand. Thank you!
Tap the phone ONCE at the location indicated by the red dots as they appear. You may use either hand, but please do not switch your phone-holding hand during logging.
Logging is now done. Thank you!
